long_description: The men's Terry Fly Ti saddle has earned a reputation of offering excellent comfort and support for just about any riding need, be it casual commutes or endurance events. Flat across the top with a center cutout for great comfort, support and soft-tissue sensitivity. Multidensity, injection-molded foam supplies a supportive, comfortable feel; rear of saddle boasts a slightly stiffer foam for more power while pedaling. Titanium rails are lightweight and strong, and are attached to the shell with an integrated suspension bridge design that reduces road shock. The Terry Fly Ti saddle features a honeycomb-textured leather cover to deliver durable performance and comfort.
short_description: The men's Terry Fly Ti saddle has earned a reputation of offering excellent comfort and support for just about any riding need, be it casual commutes or endurance events.
